infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app may use the camera for enhanced features and functionality.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app may access contacts to provide personalized experiences.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app may access calendar data to provide scheduling features.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app may use location services to provide location-based features.
